title: Koronis Line
summary: The Koronis Line is a miner-hauler hybrid line of the Mining Guild. They make up for their reduced mining power with cargo slots, which can be used to hold far more ores than the Everest Line. Crafting them requires Blueprints from the Mining Guild.
full_text:
The Koronis Line is a miner-hauler hybrid line of the Mining Guild. They make up for their reduced mining power with cargo slots, which can be used to hold far more ores than the Everest Line. Crafting them requires Blueprints from the Mining Guild.
The Koronis Line consists of 3 craftable ships, listed below.
T1
Corvette
Frigate
Destroyer
Koronis
Eos
Vesta

Compared to the Everest line, these ships have slightly reduced mining rates but more cargo space to hold ores. As such, these are ideal for long wild mining trips as they do not need to return home to deposit ores like the Everest line.
You can haul cargo with these ships, although it is not recommended as even a Bison would have more cargo space.
These ships are less useful than the Everest Line when mining in non-Wild systems, as nearby stations negate the advantage of extra storage space.

All of the Koronis Line vessels are named after asteroids.
Prior to the Getting Around update, these were Trade Union ships.
The Destroyer of this line will likely be named the Polana.
